description: Slimming the Australis Theme of Firefox 28 and later

preferences.title: Place Personal Toolbar (Bookmarks) over Navigation Bar
preferences.name: personalOverNav
preferences.description: Makes Personal Toolbar appear over Navigation Bar. (Automatically applied when Auto Hiding Nav Bar is checked)

preferences.title: Automatically Hide Navigation Bar
preferences.name: autoHideNavbar
preferences.description: The Navigation Bar will only be visible when the mouse is over the Bookmarks and Tabs area, as well as when writing an url or using the searchbar.

preferences.title: ├ Enable "Select Location Bar" Shortcut
preferences.name: _selectLocationBarShortcut
preferences.description: Re-enables the "Select Location Bar" default shortcut (Ctrl+L on Windows) when "Automatically Hide Navigation Bar" is active.

preferences.title: └ Auto Select Location Input on New Tab
preferences.name: _selectLocationBar
preferences.description: Re-enables auto selecting the location field when "Automatically Hide Navigation Bar" is active.

preferences.title: Tabs in Titlebar
preferences.name: tabsInTitlebar
preferences.description: Move the tabs into the title bars when having restored(non-fullscreen) windows.

preferences.title: Compress Toolbar/Navigation Bar Items
preferences.name: compressToolbar
preferences.description: Should make the Navigation Bar slimmer when having custom icons in it.

preferences.title: Small Tab Bar (Broken)
preferences.name: smallTabbar
preferences.description: Vertically compresses the Tab Bar and Tabs.

author: Faleij
name: australis-slimmr
